alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:36PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wyandotte, central Leavenworth, north central Johnson and southeastern Platte Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lansing, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Leavenworth, Lansing, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Parkville, Basehor, Edwardsville, Riverside, Weatherby Lake, Lake Quivira, Kansas City, Fairmount, Farley, Pomeroy, Waldron, Stillings, Muncie, Maywood and Wolcott. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 417. Interstate 635 near mile marker 7. Interstate 435 between mile markers 7 and 24. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 217 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
